s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: Forrest provides a sound technological infrastructure for open software development for the Apache Software Foundation based on ASF software, ASF practices and experience, and modern software design principles.

s1.title: Project Status
s1.p: The Forrest project is new and needs your help to get started. Please see the FAQ and join the discussion on forrest-dev@xml.apache.org
There is also a fledgling Dream List to help provide some direction.
